page.title: 19Village Mothers
page.content: Very few of the mothers work outside the home.Most stay at home and are housewives.Those who do work,go to Dundee to work or are employed in the village.The local coach company employs one mother who cleans the buses daily.Several help in the local inn,either serving snacks and drinks or cleaning the premises.Quite a few are home helps employed by the Regional Council to help the elderly or infirm with their daily chores.Our school employs three ladies,a caretaker,a lunch server, and a school crossing patrol officer. Some mothers are employed,cleaning private homes.The local playgroup is run by mothers.One of our enterprising parents travels around with her puppet theatre,and is in great demand.
